misc: Waters the course more than the course sprinklers.
biography: Pekka is a highly accomplished golfer whose dedication to the game is evident in every aspect of his play.  A member of Espoo Ringside Golf, Pekka consistently demonstrates a mastery of the course, a skill honed over years of dedicated practice and competition.

His Hector Trophée record speaks volumes.  Pekka has competed in the prestigious invitational since 2022, making appearances in 2023, 2024, and 2025. Notably, he secured a victory in the 2020 Hector Trophée, showcasing his exceptional talent under pressure. While he hasn’t yet claimed the Victor trophy for the best individual performance, his consistent presence and past success highlight his potential to contend for this honor in the future.

Beyond his competitive record, Pekka’s commitment to his game extends to unique practices.  Known for his meticulous attention to detail, Pekka’s routine includes personally watering the course – often more so than the automatic sprinklers. This devotion underscores his deep understanding of course conditions and his relentless pursuit of excellence.
